backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles and per-user surgery cases with access control, type definitions, case creation, and update scaffolding.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests supporting clean rebuild and redeploy workflows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to concise summaries describing their functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Documentation explaining when and how to perform a clean frontend rebuild to refresh backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables for light and dark modes and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
Shell script performing a deterministic clean rebuild of the frontend including dependency install, backend binding regeneration, and fresh build.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide describing how to verify that the deployed frontend uses fresh backend bindings and the correct canister ID.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, case list management, search, sorting, and modal-based case editing.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Camera UI component enabling photo capture, camera switching, and safe cleanup with data URL output for storage.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with demographics, arrival date, complaint, and editable task checklist, syncing updates locally and to the server.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing cases with prefill logic, demographics input, validation, and task checklist setup.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Fetches, filters, sorts, and displays cases using CaseCard, showing loading, empty, or search‑no‑results states as needed.
Reusable date input with manual entry and calendar popover, validating and formatting date strings.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Allows quick demographics entry with optional camera capture, handling image storage, errors, and preview.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Shows empty-state guidance, including migration instructions depending on authentication and connection state.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Provides UI controls for selecting sort field and toggling sort direction for the case list.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders a checklist of required tasks, normalizing input and toggling task states via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all cases to a CSV file and downloads it, showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: Handles CSV file upload, parsing, validation, and importing cases with user feedback and error handling.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs details and shows a fallback UI with a close button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays footer with current year, branding, and a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Shows app header with authentication controls, environment label, and identity-based login/logout logic.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Displays a recovery screen for startup connection errors with retry and reload options and contextual guidance.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Shows online status, backend connection state, and sync actions with appropriate error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor with error tracking and retry logic to detect failed actor initialization.
Combines identity, actor, and a backend probe to report connection status and provide a full retry flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases and provides mutations for adding, updating, deleting, and importing cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Determines environment label (Draft or Live) based on hostname heuristics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Synchronizes pending local surgery case changes with the backend and refreshes merged state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines LocalSurgeryCase and CaseFormData types extending backend models and re-exports task-related types.
Classifies backend errors into categories and generates user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts surgery cases to CSV and parses CSV files with validation, warnings, and custom line parsing.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides timezone-safe date-only parsing, formatting, and conversion utilities including nanosecond conversions.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and validates a draft admin token from URL or sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Handles saving, loading, and clearing surgery cases in localStorage with BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server cases while preserving local-only fields and prepares cases for sync.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the latest case matching an MRN and extracts demographic prefill data.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities for creating, normalizing, and updating a 7‑item tasks checklist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests for the Surgery Case Tracker.
